name: Infestissumam
description:
Something very hostile is threatening you...but will it be real?

Brief Description

Face your deepest and darkest fears frenetically waiting for the night to come to an end!

Controls

Arrows or WASD to move!

Credits

Art by Nicola Guarino - see his ArtStation profile!

Special Thanks

This game was submitted for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

We participated because we wanted to experiment with 2D and pixel art. We only undertook 3D development by far, and it was a pleasure to discover that you can get pretty results with not that much effort.

Thanks Brackeys for all you've done.
